casebody.data:
DONALD GAYLE v. BASIL YOUNG ET AL. (14582)

Landau, Schaller and Hennessy, Js.

Argued May 2 officially released June 4, 1996 Per Curiam.

In this appeal arising from a judgment in a summary process action, the first five issues are dismissed as untimely pursuant to HUD/Barbour-Waverly v. Wilson, 235 Conn. 650, 668 A.2d 1309 (1995). We consider only the sixth and final issue presented to us on appeal.

The judgment is affirmed.
